channel.title: CVE Feed for Verizon -- Fios Quantum Gateway (G1100)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Verizon -- Fios Quantum Gateway (G1100)

item.title: CVE-2019-3914|2024-08-04T19:26:27.491Z -- verizon -- fios%20quantum%20gateway%20%28g1100%29
item.description: Remote command injection vulnerability in Verizon Fios Quantum Gateway (G1100) firmware version 02.01.00.05 allows a remote, authenticated attacker to execute arbitrary commands on the target device by adding an access control rule for a network object with a crafted hostname.

item.title: CVE-2019-3916|2024-08-04T19:26:27.582Z -- verizon -- fios%20quantum%20gateway%20%28g1100%29
item.description: Information disclosure vulnerability in Verizon Fios Quantum Gateway (G1100) firmware version 02.01.00.05 allows an remote, unauthenticated attacker to retrieve the value of the password salt by simply requesting an API URL in a web browser (e.g. /api).

item.title: CVE-2019-3915|2024-08-04T19:26:27.754Z -- verizon -- fios%20quantum%20gateway%20%28g1100%29
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Capture-replay vulnerability in Verizon Fios Quantum Gateway (G1100) firmware version 02.01.00.05 allows an unauthenticated attacker with adjacent network access to intercept and replay login requests to gain access to the administrative web interface.
